original: “Bhante nāgasena, aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhi pariṇamati paripākaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: bhante nāgasena aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhi pariṇamati paripākam gacchati

original: Vayapariṇāmena buddhi pariṇamati paripākaṁ gacchati, yasapariṇāmena buddhi pariṇamati
analyzed: vaya pariṇāmena buddhi pariṇamati paripākam gacchati yasa pariṇāmena buddhi pariṇamati

original: paripākaṁ gacchati, paripucchāya buddhi pariṇamati paripākaṁ gacchati, titthasaṁvāsena
analyzed: paripākam gacchati paripucchāya buddhi pariṇamati paripākam gacchati tittha savāsena

original: buddhi pariṇamati paripākaṁ gacchati, yoniso manasikārena buddhi pariṇamati paripākaṁ
analyzed: buddhi pariṇamati paripākam gacchati yonisaḥ manasikārena buddhi pariṇamati paripāka

original: gacchati, sākacchāya buddhi pariṇamati paripākaṁ gacchati, snehūpasevanena buddhi
analyzed: gacchati buddhi pariṇamati paripākam gacchati snehu upasevanena

original: pariṇamati paripākaṁ gacchati, patirūpadesavāsena buddhi pariṇamati paripākaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: pariṇamati paripākam gacchati buddhi pariṇamati paripākam gacchati
